==Abyssal Moon Spire==
===Floor 9===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
** {{Pyro}} and {{Electro}} DMG dealt by all party members increased by 75%. [[Overloaded]] DMG increased by 200%.
*'''Additional Effects'''
**In Chamber 1's First Half, one of the Large Pyro Slimes is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Pyro|Smouldering Flames}}.
**In Chamber 1's Second Half, one of the Large Pyro Slimes is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Pyro|Smouldering Flames}}.
**In Chamber 2's First Half, the Fatui Electro Cicin Mage is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Electro|Lightning Stake}}.
**In Chamber 2's First Half, the Cryogunner Legionnaire is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}.
**In Chamber 3's First Half, the Geovishap Hatchling is empowered with a {{Geo}} Aura which periodically spawns {{Color|Geo|Rumbling Stone}}.

===Floor 10===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
** Your character will be periodically inflicted with {{Color|Pyro|Smoldering Flames}}, causing you to take {{Color|Pyro DMG}} until the inflicted {{Pyro}} element is removed. Incoming healing bonus of all party members increased by 50%.
*'''Additional Effects'''
**In Chamber 1's Second Half, one of the Pyro Abyss Mages and Blazing Axe Mitachurls are empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Pyro|Pursuing Fireball}}.
**In Chamber 2's First Half, the Blazing Axe Mitachurl is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Pyro|Pursuing Fireball}}.
**In Chamber 2's Second Half, one of the Blazing Axe Mitachurls and the Pyro Abyss Mage are empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Pyro|Pursuing Fireball}}.
**In Chamber 3's First Half, one of the Anemoboxer Vanguards is empowered with an {{Anemo}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Anemo|Vacuum Vortex}}.
**In Chamber 3's Second Half, the Pyro Abyss Mage is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Pyro|Pursuing Fireball}}.

===Floor 11===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
** {{Electro}} and {{Cryo}} DMG dealt by all party members increased by 75%. [[Superconduct]] DMG increased by 300%, and decreases target's Physical RES by an additional 20%.
*'''Additional Effects'''
**In Chamber 1's First Half, one of the Large Cryo Slimes is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Cryo|Condensed Ice}}.
**In Chamber 1's Second Half, the Fatui Electro Cicin Mage is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Electro|Engulfing Storm}}. There's also a Cryo Abyss Mage empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}.
**In Chamber 2's Second Half, one of the Blazing Axe Mitachurls is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Pyro|Smouldering Flames}}. The other Blazing Axe Mitachurl is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Pyro|Pursuing Fireball}}.
**In Chamber 3's First Half, one of the Cryogunner Legionnaires is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}, while the other is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Cryo|Condensed Ice}}.
**In Chamber 3's Second Half, one of the Electrohammer Vanguards is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Electro|Engulfing Storm}}, while the other is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Electro|Lightning Stake}}.

===Floor 12===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
**Your Character will be periodically inflicted with {{Color|Cryo|Condensed Ice}}, greatly increasing your Stamina Consumption and preventing its natural regeneration until the inflicted {{Cryo}} element is removed. {{Color|Pyro DMG}} dealt by all party members increased by 75%.
*'''Additional Effects'''
**In Chamber 1's Second Half, one of the Large Cryo Slimes and Cryo Abyss Mage are empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}.
**In Chamber 2's Second Half, one of the Large Cryo Slimes and Cryo Abyss Mage are empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}.
**In Chamber 3's First Half, the Cryogunner Legionnaire is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}. One of the Electrohammer Legionnaires is empowered with a {{Electro}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Electro|Engulfing Storm}}.
**In Chamber 3's Second Half, one of the Cryogunner Legionnaires is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura which inflicts characters with {{Color|Cryo|Condensed Ice}}. The Electrohammer Legionnaire is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which periodically spawns a {{Color|Electro|Lightning Stake}}.
